## Summary of Inputs
- **Selected Station**: `r params$selected_station`
- **Station Address**: `r params$station_address`
- **Forecast Date**: `r params$forecast_date`
- **Risk Threshold**: `r params$threshold`%
- **Fungicide Applied in Last 14 Days**: `r ifelse(params$fungicide, "Yes", "No")`
- **Growth Stage Within V10-R3**: `r ifelse(params$growth_stage, "Yes", "No")`

## Tar Spot Data Summary
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

if (!is.null(params$tarspot) && nrow(params$tarspot) > 0) {
  # Select specific columns to display
  tarspot_table <- params$tarspot %>%
    select(Date = date_day, Risk, Risk_Class)
  
  # Render the table
  kable(
    tarspot_table,
    caption = "Summary of Tar Spot Data",
    format = "markdown"
  )
} else {
  cat("No Tar Spot data available.")
}
```
